entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
